word: Hold fast to the truth, the precious, sanctifying truth.  You are then in the best of company, and the very highest intelligences are beholding your course of action.  You are a spectacle to the world, to angels, and to men.  Under provocation, your work is to hold the faith and a good conscience, "Which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck."--Letter 17, 1897 (April 7, 1897).
